cta-text: Join TravelMon today and start sharing your travel experiences, discovering new destinations, and connecting with other travel enthusiasts.
description-home:
Whether you're an experienced globetrotter or just planning your first trip, TravelMon has everything you need to make your trips unforgettable. 
Join this great community of fellow travelers and start exploring the world.
email-already-in-use: Email is already in use. Please use another one.
info-error-update: There was an error updating user information
invalid-credential: The username or password is incorrect.
password-error-update: There was an error updating the user's password
search-text: Find and share incredible places, meet fellow travelers, and get inspired for your next trip.
title-home: TravelMon is a platform for travel enthusiasts
travel-budget-text: Know the travel budget in detail
travel-guides-text: Explore the world with detailed guides and itineraries
travel-photos-text: Share your travel experiences and inspire others
travel-stories-text: Tell your travel stories with beautiful layouts
travel-tips-text: Get practical advice for your next trip
user-not-found: User not found. Please register an account.
want-log-in: Do you already have an account? Log in
want-sign-up: You do not have an account? Sign up
weak-new-password: The new password must be at least 6 characters.
weak-password: The password is weak. Must be at least 6 characters.
